Package com.mimecast.robin.smtp.auth

package com.mimecast.robin.smtp.auth
Implements various SMTP authentication mechanisms.

This package contains the SMTP authentication mechanisms.
They are loaded by the AuthVerb class.

The following mechanisms are supported:

  • LOGIN
  • PLAIN
  • CRAM-MD5
  • DIGEST-MD5
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.mimecast.robin.smtp
    The heart of the Robin application, providing core SMTP client and server functionalities.
